message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're on a budget, but I have to make a profit. I can do $160, and that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite there yet. I can do $155, and that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product!
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet. I'd be willing to pay $145 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $155, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $145 and $155. How about $150?
